items.title: DOGE keeps gaining access to sensitive data. Now, it can cut off billions to farmers
items.description: DOGE recently gained high-level access to a database that controls government payments and loans to farmers and ranchers across the U.S.

items.title: Photos: Before-and-after satellite images show extent of Texas flooding destruction
items.description: Before-and-after images show how the Guadalupe River surged and devastated towns across Texas.
